p: The mixture of 1.0 mmol of ethanolamine (0.06 mL), 3.0 mmol of paraformaldehyde (0.09 g), and 3.0 mmol of secondary phosphine oxide [diphenylphosphine oxide (0.61 g), bis( p-tolyl)phosphine oxide (0.69 g), or bis(3,5-dimethylphenyl)phosphine oxide (0.77 g)] in 2 mL of acetonitrile was irradiated in a sealed tube at 120 °C for 1 h in a CEM Discover Microwave reactor equipped with a pressure controller.
